backups.title: Backup database
backups.description: You can trigger a backup here. The process can take some time depending on the amount of data (especially attachments) you have.
backups.warning: A new backup will override any previous one

confirmDialog.title: Confirm backup database
confirmDialog.warning: Note: This action cannot be undone!
confirmDialog.description: You are about to trigger a database backup. This process can take some time depending on the amount of data.
